page.title: 09CLUBS_BROWNIES
page.content: In the Brownies we have a {uniform } with a tie which is yellow You get a badge when you are enrolled.You get a silver badge and a material badge for your shoulder. You put it on a brown dress. The brown dress has a pocket. If you want you can have a purse on your belt which you put your {subs}in. At the meetings we have a {toadstool.}On the toadstool is a brownowl.We put our subs under the toadstool. We have a {Brown Owl}and a{ {Tawny owl.} They look after the pack. When the Brown Owl is ill the Tawny Owl looks after us. Their uniform is a blue dress and a blue tie with a brass badge with GG at each side. We do games and work and drawings. We are doing our sports badge in the summer holidays .We have done our friendship badge and we are doing a hostess one.
